verses.text: Now \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w* \w slept|strong="H7901"\w* with his \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, and was \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* with his \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* in the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w*. And \w Jehoram|strong="H3088"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* in his stead.

And he had \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w*, \w Azariah|strong="H5838"\w*, and \w Jehiel|strong="H3171"\w*, and \w Zechariah|strong="H2148"\w*, and \w Azariah|strong="H5838"\w*, and \w Michael|strong="H4317"\w*, and \w Shephatiah|strong="H8203"\w*: all these \add were\add* the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

And their \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* them \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w gifts|strong="H4979"\w* of \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, and of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, and of precious \w things|strong="H4030"\w*, with \w fenced|strong="H4694"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* in \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*: but the \w kingdom|strong="H4467"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* he to \w Jehoram|strong="H3088"\w*; because he \add was\add* the \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w*.

Now when \w Jehoram|strong="H3088"\w* was risen \w up|strong="H6965"\w* to the \w kingdom|strong="H4467"\w* of his \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, he \w strengthened|strong="H2388"\w* himself, and \w slew|strong="H2026"\w* all his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* with the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, and \add divers\add* also of the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

¶ \w Jehoram|strong="H3088"\w* \add was\add* \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* and \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* when he began to \w reign|strong="H4427"\w*, and he \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* \w eight|strong="H8083"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

And he \w walked|strong="H3212"\w* in the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, like as \w did|strong="H6213"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w*: for he had the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w* to \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*: and he \w wrought|strong="H6213"\w* \add that which was\add* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* in the \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

Howbeit the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w would|strong="H0014"\w* not \w destroy|strong="H7843"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, because of the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* that he had \w made|strong="H3772"\w* with \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, and as he \w promised|strong="H0559"\w* to \w give|strong="H5414"\w* a \w light|strong="H5216"\w* to him and to his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* for \w ever|strong="H3117"\w*.\f + \fr 21.7 \ft light: Heb. lamp, or, candle\f*

¶ In his \w days|strong="H3117"\w* the \w Edomites|strong="H0123"\w* \w revolted|strong="H6586"\w* from under the \w dominion|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and \w made|strong="H4427"\w* themselves a \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.\f + \fr 21.8 \ft dominion: Heb. hand\f*

Then \w Jehoram|strong="H3088"\w* went \w forth|strong="H5674"\w* with his \w princes|strong="H8269"\w*, and all his \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w* with him: and he rose \w up|strong="H6965"\w* by \w night|strong="H3915"\w*, and \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* the \w Edomites|strong="H0123"\w* which compassed him \w in|strong="H5437"\w*, and the \w captains|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w*.

So the \w Edomites|strong="H0123"\w* \w revolted|strong="H6586"\w* from under the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* unto this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*. The same \w time|strong="H6256"\w* \add also\add* did \w Libnah|strong="H3841"\w* \w revolt|strong="H6586"\w* from under his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*; because he had \w forsaken|strong="H5800"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of his \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*.

Moreover he \w made|strong="H6213"\w* high \w places|strong="H1116"\w* in the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and caused the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* to commit \w fornication|strong="H2181"\w*, and \w compelled|strong="H5080"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \add thereto\add*.

¶ And there \w came|strong="H0935"\w* a \w writing|strong="H4385"\w* to him from \w Elijah|strong="H0452"\w* the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w* thy \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, Because thou hast not \w walked|strong="H1980"\w* in the \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* of \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w* thy \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, nor in the \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* of \w Asa|strong="H0609"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*,

But hast \w walked|strong="H3212"\w* in the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and hast made \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* and the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* to go a \w whoring|strong="H2181"\w*, like to the \w whoredoms|strong="H2181"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w*, and also hast \w slain|strong="H2026"\w* thy \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* of thy \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \add which were\add* \w better|strong="H2896"\w* than thyself:

Behold, with a \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w plague|strong="H4046"\w* will the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w smite|strong="H5062"\w* thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and thy \w children|strong="H1121"\w*, and thy \w wives|strong="H0802"\w*, and all thy \w goods|strong="H7399"\w*:\f + \fr 21.14 \ft a great…: Heb. a great stroke\f*

And thou \add shalt have\add* \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w sickness|strong="H2483"\w* by \w disease|strong="H4245"\w* of thy \w bowels|strong="H4578"\w*, until thy \w bowels|strong="H4578"\w* fall \w out|strong="H3318"\w* by reason of the \w sickness|strong="H2483"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* by \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

¶ Moreover the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* stirred \w up|strong="H5782"\w* against \w Jehoram|strong="H3088"\w* the \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*, and of the \w Arabians|strong="H6163"\w*, that \add were\add* \w near|strong="H5921"\w* the \w Ethiopians|strong="H3569"\w*:

And they came \w up|strong="H5927"\w* into \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and \w brake|strong="H1234"\w* into it, and carried \w away|strong="H7617"\w* all the \w substance|strong="H7399"\w* that was \w found|strong="H4672"\w* in the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, and his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* also, and his \w wives|strong="H0802"\w*; so that there was never a \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w left|strong="H7604"\w* him, save \w Jehoahaz|strong="H3059"\w*, the \w youngest|strong="H6996"\w* of his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*.\f + \fr 21.17 \ft carried…: Heb. carried captive\f*\f + \fr 21.17 \ft Jehoahaz: also called, Ahaziah, or, Azariah\f*

¶ And \w after|strong="H0310"\w* all this the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w smote|strong="H5062"\w* him in his \w bowels|strong="H4578"\w* with an \w incurable|strong="H0369"\w* \w disease|strong="H2483"\w*.

And it came to pass, that in process of \w time|strong="H3117"\w*, \w after|strong="H3318"\w* the \w end|strong="H7093"\w* of \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w years|strong="H3117"\w*, his \w bowels|strong="H4578"\w* fell \w out|strong="H3318"\w* by \w reason|strong="H5973"\w* of his \w sickness|strong="H2483"\w*: so he \w died|strong="H4191"\w* of \w sore|strong="H7451"\w* \w diseases|strong="H8463"\w*. And his \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* no \w burning|strong="H8316"\w* for him, like the \w burning|strong="H8316"\w* of his \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*.

\w Thirty|strong="H7970"\w* and \w two|strong="H8147"\w* years \w old|strong="H1121"\w* was he when he began to \w reign|strong="H4427"\w*, and he \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w eight|strong="H8083"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*, and \w departed|strong="H3212"\w* without being \w desired|strong="H2532"\w*. Howbeit they \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* him in the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, but not in the \w sepulchres|strong="H6913"\w* of the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w*.\f + \fr 21.20 \ft without…: Heb. without desire\f*
